original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantā sūpaññeva bahuṁ bhuñjanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū piṇḍapātam bhuñjantā bahum bhuñjanti pe
sama sūpakam piṇḍapātam bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
mugga sūpaḥ māsa sūpaḥ hattha hāriyaḥ

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sūpaññeva bahuṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca su upaññā iva bahum bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
